name: Game Jam Simulator (PugByte, drago3711)
description:
Do you have a family? Do you also like to enter game jams?

This game simulates what it's like to balance family life with game development. It's especially difficult when you have a newborn baby to keep alive. How will you find any time to design and develop a game? You'll need exceptional time management skills to finish your game jam entry with high quality.

Feed babies, change dirty diapers and stay alive! Good luck... you'll need it.

Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Interact: SPACE
  • Exit minigames: ESC

There is also a global leader board you can submit your high scores to! See how you stack up against other Game Jam Simulator players.

All game assets including art, music and code where made by:

  • Kevin Smith
  • Karl Brewer

Software used:

  • Godot Engine v3.2.2.stable.official
  • Gimp
  • Audacity
  • OBS

Based on a true story.

Source code: https://github.com/kevinms/godot-wild-jam-24
